title: Banned for "botting"
body: So.. I'm not even smart enough to do the whole modding thing, I had to google what it even was. I went to log in today to get a horrible pop up telling me I've been permanently banned for the use of "botting". I hadn't logged in for about a week and have no idea how this even happened. I'm freaking out, I spent a good sum of money on champs and skins and so I'm really upset and don't know how to fix this, I'm completely innocent here. Please some one help me.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to offer you more details on the punishment, and if the punishment was a result of compromise, start you on the account recovery process.
